dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: SeaTunnelX One-stop Operation and Maintenance Management Overview
dashboard.welcomeDesc: Start by adding hosts and deploying your first SeaTunnel cluster

logout.success: You have been logged out successfully

callback.title: Welcome to SeaTunnel Operations Platform
callback.footer: SeaTunnel Operations Platform - Making data integration easier

terms.agreement: By logging in, you agree to our

termsDialog.title: Terms of Service
termsDialog.description: Please read the following terms of service carefully. By using this service, you agree to these terms.

general.title: 1. General Terms
general.content1: These Terms of Service (hereinafter referred to as "Terms") set forth the conditions for your use of the SeaTunnel Operations Platform.
general.content2: By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
general.content3: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Modified terms will take effect immediately upon posting.

usage.title: 2. Usage Rules
usage.content1: You agree to use our services in a lawful and responsible manner, strictly complying with applicable laws and regulations.
usage.content2: Prohibited behaviors include but are not limited to:
usage.prohibited1: Posting illegal, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, or otherwise objectionable content
usage.prohibited2: Attempting unauthorized access to our systems or other users' accounts
usage.prohibited3: Interfering with or disrupting the normal operation of services
usage.prohibited4: Violating any applicable laws or regulations

content.title: 3. Content Standards
content.intro: To maintain a healthy online environment, distribution of the following types of content is strictly prohibited:
content.pornography: Pornographic content: Any content containing pornography, obscenity, nudity, or sexual suggestions
content.promotion: Promotional content: Commercial advertisements, marketing promotions, spam, or other commercial content
content.illegal: Illegal content: Any content that violates applicable laws and regulations
content.harmful: Harmful information: Violence, terrorism, extremism, or content that endangers national security
content.false: False information: Rumors, fake news, or misleading information
content.infringement: Infringing content: Content that infringes on intellectual property rights, privacy rights, or other legal rights of others
content.warning: Once violating content is discovered, we will immediately remove it and may terminate the associated account.

legal.title: 4. Legal Compliance
legal.intro: This service strictly complies with applicable laws and regulations, including but not limited to:
legal.law5: Network Information Content Ecological Governance Regulations
legal.compliance: Users must comply with the above laws and regulations and other relevant provisions when using the service.
legal.cooperation: For violations of laws and regulations, we will cooperate with relevant authorities for investigation and handling.

account.title: 5. Account Responsibility
account.content1: You are responsible for maintaining the accuracy and security of your account information.
account.content2: You are responsible for all activities conducted using your account.
account.content3: If you discover any unauthorized use, please notify us immediately.

intellectual.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content1: All content in the service, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
intellectual.content2: Without our explicit written permission, you may not copy, modify, distribute, or otherwise use this content.

limitation.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content1: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages.
limitation.content2: Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid for the service in the past 12 months.

privacyDialog.title: Privacy Policy
privacyDialog.description: We value your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

collection.title: 1. Information Collection
collection.intro: We collect the following types of information:
collection.item1: Account information: Public information such as username and avatar obtained through OAuth
collection.item2: Usage data: Information about how you use our services
collection.item3: Technical information: IP address, device information, browser type, etc.
collection.item4: Log information: Server logs and error reports

usage.title: 2. Information Usage
usage.intro: We use the collected information for:

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content1: We do not sell, exchange, or rent your personal information to third parties.
sharing.content2: We may share your information in the following circumstances:
sharing.item3: To protect our rights and property
sharing.item4: With trusted service providers (subject to confidentiality agreements)

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.intro: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your information:
security.item3: Regular security audits and vulnerability scanning
security.warning: Please note that no data transmission or storage method is 100% secure.

retention.title: 5. Data Retention
retention.intro: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary:
retention.item1: Account information: Duration of account existence
retention.deletion: You can request deletion of your account and related data at any time.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
rights.item1: Right of access: View information we hold about you
rights.item2: Right of correction: Correct inaccurate information
rights.item3: Right of deletion: Request deletion of your personal information
rights.item4: Right to restrict processing: Limit how we process your information

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: SeaTunnelX is a one-stop operations platform for data integration, providing fast, secure, and convenient data synchronization services. The platform supports multiple data sources with comprehensive task management and monitoring capabilities.

host.title: Host Management
host.description: Manage hosts for SeaTunnel cluster deployment
host.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete host {name}? This action cannot be undone.
host.name: Host Name
host.k8sCredentialsHint: Provide either kubeconfig or token for authentication
host.leaveEmptyToKeep: Leave empty to keep current value
host.uninstallCommandTip: Add --remove-logs to also remove log files

errors.dockerUrlInvalid: Invalid Docker API URL format (use tcp:// or unix://)
errors.k8sUrlInvalid: Invalid Kubernetes API URL format (use https:// or http://)
errors.k8sCredentialsRequired: Either kubeconfig or token is required for Kubernetes

cluster.title: Cluster Management
cluster.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete cluster {name}? This action cannot be undone.
cluster.name: Cluster Name
cluster.deploymentModeCannotChange: Deployment mode cannot be changed after creation
cluster.hybridDescription: Master and worker run on the same nodes
cluster.separatedDescription: Master and worker run on different nodes
cluster.nodeInstallDirDescription: SeaTunnel installation directory on this node
cluster.stopConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to stop cluster {name}? All running tasks will be interrupted.
cluster.restartConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to restart cluster {name}? All running tasks will be interrupted.
cluster.addNodeDescription: Add a host as a node to this cluster
cluster.removeNodeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove node {name} from this cluster?
cluster.noAvailableHosts: No available hosts with Agent installed
cluster.onlyAgentInstalledHosts: Only hosts with Agent installed can be added as nodes
cluster.workerRoleDescription: Worker node executes data synchronization tasks
cluster.portConfigDescription: Ports will be validated via Agent when adding the node
cluster.selectNodesToOperate: Please select nodes from the list below to operate

wizard.title: Deploy Cluster Wizard
wizard.basicDesc: Configure cluster name and deployment mode
wizard.selectHostsDesc: Select hosts with Agent installed to deploy SeaTunnel
wizard.noAvailableHostsDesc: Please add hosts with Agent installed first
wizard.selectPluginsDesc: Select plugins to install with SeaTunnel (optional)
wizard.pluginsOptional: Plugin selection is optional. You can install plugins later from the Plugin Marketplace.
wizard.deployWarning: Please review the configuration carefully. Deployment will install SeaTunnel on all selected hosts.
wizard.deployingDesc: Installing SeaTunnel on selected hosts. This may take a few minutes.
wizard.deployCompleteDesc: Your SeaTunnel cluster has been deployed successfully.
wizard.confirmCancel: Deployment is in progress. Are you sure you want to cancel?
wizard.noLocalPackagesDesc: Please go to Package Management to download or upload packages before using offline installation mode.
wizard.packageAlreadyDownloaded: This version package is already downloaded locally
wizard.packageWillDownload: Package will be downloaded automatically during deployment
wizard.packageWillDownloadDesc: Online mode will automatically download the package from the mirror source. Once downloaded, it will be saved locally for future use.
wizard.selectLocalPluginsDesc: Select locally downloaded plugins to install (optional)
wizard.noLocalPluginsForVersion: No local plugins for this version
wizard.noLocalPluginsForVersionDesc: No local plugins downloaded for version {version}. Please go to Plugin Marketplace to download the required plugins first.
wizard.packageNotFoundDesc: Package for version {version} is not available locally. It will be downloaded from the mirror source during deployment.
wizard.mirrorHint: If the package is not available locally, it will be downloaded from the selected mirror source during deployment.
wizard.manualUploadDesc: If you cannot access the network, you can manually upload the package.
wizard.workerPortDesc: Worker node port for separated mode, default 5802
wizard.precheckDesc: Check if all selected hosts meet the installation requirements
wizard.readyToPrecheckDesc: Click the button below to check if {count} hosts meet the installation requirements
wizard.precheckFailedWarning: Some hosts failed precheck. Please resolve the issues and recheck.
wizard.precheckPassedInfo: All hosts passed precheck. Ready to deploy.

audit.commandsDescription: View command execution history and status
audit.commandDetailDescription: View command execution details, output, and errors

config.title: Config Management
config.templateDesc: Cluster template config serves as the baseline for all nodes
config.nodeConfigsDesc: Individual node configurations that can differ from cluster template
config.initHint: Configs will be initialized automatically after cluster installation
config.saveConfigDesc: Enter a comment for this change (optional)
config.templateVersionHistoryDesc: View version history of cluster template config
config.nodeVersionHistoryDesc: View version history of node {node} config
config.rollbackConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to rollback to version v{version}? Current config will be overwritten.
config.saveSuccessWithPushError: Config saved, but failed to push to node: {error}
config.promoteSuccess: Config promoted to all cluster nodes
config.syncSuccessWithPushError: Config synced, but failed to push to node: {error}
config.rollbackSuccessWithPushError: Config rolled back, but failed to push to node: {error}
config.initFromNodeDesc: Pull configuration files from a node to initialize cluster template and node configs
config.selectNodePlaceholder: Select a node to sync configs from
config.initWillPull: The following config files will be pulled from this node:
config.syncAllSuccessWithPushErrors: Synced to {count} nodes, but failed to push to: {nodes}
config.syncAllNoChanges: All node configs already match template
config.syncAllFailed: Failed to sync to all nodes

plugin.marketplaceDesc: Browse and manage SeaTunnel connectors and plugins
plugin.availableDesc: Plugins available for installation from Maven repository
plugin.customDesc: Upload and manage custom developed plugins
plugin.selectClusterToViewInstalled: Select a cluster to view installed plugins
plugin.goToClusterDetail: Go to cluster detail page to manage installed plugins
plugin.searchPlaceholder: Search plugins by name or description
plugin.loadingFromMavenDesc: First load may take 30-60 seconds, subsequent loads will use cache
plugin.versionNote: Plugin version matches the SeaTunnel main version
plugin.transformBuiltInDesc: All Transform plugins are included in seatunnel-transforms-v2.jar, shipped with SeaTunnel installation package. No separate download needed, enabled by default.
plugin.uploadCustomPlugin: Upload custom developed plugin JAR files
plugin.customPluginNote: Custom plugins should be placed in connectors directory, dependencies in lib directory
plugin.uninstallConfirm: Are you sure you want to uninstall plugin {name}? This will remove the plugin from all nodes in the cluster.
plugin.installPluginDesc: Select a target cluster to install this plugin
plugin.managePluginDesc: Install, enable or disable this plugin on clusters
plugin.noClustersAvailable: No clusters available. Please create a cluster first.
plugin.installNote: The plugin will be installed on all nodes of the selected cluster. Connector JAR files will be placed in the connectors directory, and dependencies will be placed in the lib directory.
plugin.downloadStarted: Download queued, check progress in Local Plugins tab
plugin.downloadAllStarted: Submitted {count} plugins to download queue, check progress in Local Plugins tab
plugin.downloadAllSuccess: Download tasks submitted: {total} total, {downloaded} new, {skipped} skipped (already exist)
plugin.localPluginsDesc: Plugins downloaded to Control Plane local storage
plugin.downloadedDesc: Plugins downloaded to Control Plane local storage, ready to install to clusters
plugin.downloadFromAvailable: Download plugins from the 'Available Plugins' tab
plugin.name: Plugin Name
plugin.deleteConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to delete local plugin {name}? You will need to download it again to install to clusters.
plugin.batchInstallDesc: Install {count} plugins to the selected cluster
plugin.allClustersInstalled: This plugin is already installed on all available clusters
plugin.dependenciesDesc: Configure dependencies required by the plugin (e.g., database drivers), will be downloaded with the plugin
plugin.versionPlaceholder: Leave empty to use plugin version
plugin.allFieldsRequired: Group ID, Artifact ID and Version are all required
plugin.deleteDependencyConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete dependency {name}?
plugin.noConfiguredDependencies: No configured dependencies, add them in "Configure Dependencies"
plugin.parseMavenXmlDesc: Paste Maven dependency XML to auto-parse groupId, artifactId and version
plugin.mavenXmlParseError: Parse failed, please check XML format

installer.installDirDesc: SeaTunnel will be installed to this directory, default includes version number for multi-version coexistence
installer.packageManagementDesc: Manage SeaTunnel packages, support online download and offline upload
installer.onlineVersionsDesc: SeaTunnel versions available for download from mirrors
installer.confirmDeletePackage: Are you sure you want to delete package version {version}?
installer.dragDropOrClick: Drag and drop file here or click to select
installer.versionHint: Version number will be used to identify the package
installer.pleaseSelectFileAndVersion: Please select a file and enter version
installer.invalidFileFormat: Invalid file format, please upload .tar.gz file
installer.precheckDesc: Check if host meets installation requirements
installer.hybridDesc: Master and Worker run on the same node
installer.separatedDesc: Master and Worker run on different nodes
installer.seaTunnelNotInstalled: SeaTunnel is not installed on this host. Click the button below to start the installation wizard.
installer.agentRequiredForInstall: Agent must be installed and online before installing SeaTunnel.

installer.confirmCancelInstallation: Installation is in progress. Are you sure you want to cancel?
installer.runPrecheckPromptDesc: Click the button above to check if this host meets the installation requirements.
installer.nextStepsDesc: What would you like to do next?

userManagement.title: User Management
userManagement.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete user {username}? This action cannot be undone.
userManagement.passwordPlaceholder: Leave empty to keep current password

errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
errors.cannotDeleteSelf: Cannot delete current logged in user

assistant.title: SeaTunnel Assistant
assistant.description: Having issues? Paste your error logs or describe your problem below. The assistant will help locate issues based on SeaTunnel source code.
assistant.privacyNotice: To protect your privacy, the system automatically filters sensitive information like IP addresses, passwords, and API keys. Please review the preview before sending.
assistant.inputLabel: Enter your question or error log
assistant.inputPlaceholder: Paste error logs, exception stack traces, or describe your issue...
assistant.openDeepWikiTip: Content copied, paste it in the search box at the bottom of DeepWiki page

monitor.title: Monitor Configuration
monitor.description: Configure process monitoring and auto-restart settings
monitor.descriptionWithCluster: Configure process monitoring and auto-restart settings for cluster {name}
monitor.monitorIntervalHint: Check process status every N seconds (1-60)
monitor.maxRestartsHint: Maximum restart attempts in time window (1-10)
monitor.timeWindowHint: Time window for counting restarts (60-3600 seconds)
monitor.cooldownPeriodHint: Wait time after reaching max restarts (60-86400 seconds)

discovery.title: Auto-Discover Cluster Nodes
discovery.description: Scan host {host} for existing SeaTunnel cluster nodes
discovery.readyToDiscover: Click the button below to scan for SeaTunnel cluster nodes on this host
discovery.noClustersFound: No SeaTunnel cluster nodes found on this host
discovery.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one cluster to import
discovery.selectProcessHint: Selecting a node will auto-fill install directory and role
discovery.discoverHint: Select a host with Agent installed, click Auto-Discover to scan running SeaTunnel cluster nodes
discovery.discoverMultiHostHint: Select one or more hosts with Agent installed, click Auto-Discover to scan SeaTunnel cluster nodes on each host
